content:
As an AI, I do not have access to the artist's intentions behind the lyrics of "This Side". However, I can provide an analysis of the lyrics from a subjective standpoint.

In "This Side," the artist seems to be expressing feelings of loneliness and isolation. The opening lines, "I can't seem to find my place / Everyone's moving in such different ways," suggest a sense of disconnection from those around them. The chorus, "Can you hear me on this side? / I've been reaching but I can't find," further emphasizes this distance from others.

The lyrics also convey a sense of yearning for connection and understanding. The lines, "I just need someone to confide / Will you help me make it through the night?" express a desire for someone to listen and offer support. The repetition of the phrase "Can you hear me?" throughout the song also underscores this theme.

Overall, the lyrics of "This Side" seem to explore the emotional landscape of feeling alone in a crowded world, and the longing for someone to hear and understand those feelings.
